name: MaryPark St.
description:
MaryPark St. is a short story telling indie game, set in a black and white dream-like world. Following the main character, trying to get to his friend who seems to always be busy, as each day feels more and more repetitive.

Features


Easy to play: Generic controls: arrow keys for movement, and Z key to interact.

Intriguing Storyline: This game adheres to themes of isolation and self-reflection. MaryPark St. was designed to appeal to mass demographic whilst having it’s short but unique story.

Unique Atmosphere: The world of MaryPark St. is entirely black and white. With smooth lineart and only essential details, the setting is ominous and bleak.

Original Soundtrack

Playtime: Between 10 - 15 minutes.
